strings.Value: [Attack] "I've no interest in your excuses. Die!"
"Wait, don't attack. I just work here — I wish you no harm."

"I mainly make poisons. Don't look at me like that! It's a job — I need to eat, too, you know! I'm not killing anyone — the ones using my poisons are to blame. Sometimes I cook up healing potions too — it's just a different recipe to me."
{n}The woman's expression suddenly shifts.{/n} "Couldn't have chatted a few more minutes, you devil?! All right, fellows, out of the bushes — we'll fight in the open!"

{n}A ferocious grin spreads across the woman's face.{/n} "Ha, we shut the trap! Bit of advice for the future — don't drop your guard in an enemy camp, or you might get surrounded. Grab them, fellows!"
{n}Nok-Nok's ears perk up, and he readies his weapon.{/n} "Others come! Hear steps!"
